learning_resource_types.label: FAIRmat Tutorial
learning_resource_types.help: A tutorial created or endorsed by the FAIRmat project.

learning_resource_types.label: NOMAD Documentation
learning_resource_types.help: Official user or developer documentation from the NOMAD platform.

learning_resource_types.label: Git Repository
learning_resource_types.help: A Git-based repository containing scripts, workflows, or examples.

learning_resource_types.label: NOMAD Examples
learning_resource_types.help: Example usage cases provided by NOMAD developers or users.

learning_resource_types.label: Self-Learning Resource
learning_resource_types.help: Materials suited for individual learning, such as Jupyter notebooks.

formats.label: Video File
formats.help: A digital representation of a video (e.g., MP4, AVI).

formats.label: Technical Article
formats.help: A technical documentation or publication (e.g., blog, whitepaper).

formats.label: Presentation Document
formats.help: Slides or documents from presentations, such as PDFs or PPT files.

formats.label: Software Application
formats.help: An executable or installable software application.

formats.label: Source Code
formats.help: Source code in any programming language, such as a GitHub repo.
